name: ScriptSettings
description: Checks if a saved file exists at the provided file location steps and (if provided) checks if it can be loaded as the provided class

methods.name: load
methods.signature: public static <T> T load​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.String... fileLocationSteps)
methods.description: Loads a given class from a settings object, location base is scripts.path

methods.name: save
methods.signature: public static boolean save​(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String... fileLocationSteps)
methods.description: Saves a given object using GSON pretty print to the given file.

methods.name: exists
methods.signature: public static <T> boolean exists​(@Nullable java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.String... fileLocationSteps)
methods.description: Checks if a saved file exists at the provided file location steps and (if provided) checks if it can be loaded as the provided class
